Html:
Hi,

I need to encode an event in Vcalendar format.

I encode the string into format:

BEGIN:VCALENDAR
VERSION:1.0
BEGIN:VEVENT
DTSTART:20141216T090000Z
DTEND:20141216T100000Z
SUMMARY:Prova
LOCATION:Tortona
DESCRIPTION:via della prva
PRIORITY:3
END:VEVENT
END:VCALENDAR

but when I scan the qrcode my readers didn't recognize it.
How I can encode an event?

Thanks

https://github.com/zxing/zxing/wiki/Barcode-Contents

Check out here. Also be aware that not all QrCode reader supports this.
